rukus.text: Fama 'Amana Limusa 'Illa Dhurriyatun Min Qawmihi `Ala Khawfin Min Fir`awna Wa Mala'ihim 'An Yaftinahum Wa 'Inna Fir`awna La`alin Fi Al-'Arđi Wa 'Innahu Lamina Al-Musrifina
Wa Qala Musa Ya Qawmi 'In Kuntum 'Amantum Billahi Fa`alayhi Tawakkalu 'In Kuntum Muslimina
Faqalu `Ala Allahi Tawakkalna Rabbana La Taj`alna Fitnatan Lilqawmi Az-Zalimina
Wa Najjina Birahmatika Mina Al-Qawmi Al-Kafirina
Wa 'Awhayna 'Ila Musa Wa 'Akhihi 'An Tabawwa'a Liqawmikuma Bimisra Buyutaan Wa Aj`alu Buyutakum Qiblatan Wa 'Aqimu As-Salaata Wa Bashiri Al-Mu'uminina

Wa Qala Musa Rabbana 'Innaka 'Atayta Fir`awna Wa Mala'ahu Zinatan Wa 'Amwalaan Fi Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Rabbana Liyuđillu `An Sabilika Rabbana Atmis `Ala 'Amwalihim Wa Ashdud `Ala Qulubihim Fala Yu'uminu Hatta Yaraw Al-`Adhaba Al-'Alima
Qala Qad 'Ujibat Da`watukuma Fastaqima Wa La Tattabi`ani Sabila Al-Ladhina La Ya`lamuna

Wa Jawazna Bibani 'Isra'ila Al-Bahra Fa'atba`ahum Fir`awnu Wa Junuduhu Baghyaan Wa`adwan Hatta 'Idha 'Adrakahu Al-Gharaqu Qala 'Amantu 'Annahu La 'Ilaha 'Illa Al-Ladhi 'Amanat Bihi Banu 'Isra'ila Wa 'Ana Mina Al-Muslimina
Al'ana Wa Qad `Asayta Qablu Wa Kunta Mina Al-Mufsidina
Falyawma Nunajjika Bibadanika Litakuna Liman Khalfaka 'Ayatan Wa 'Inna Kathiraan Mina An-Nasi `An 'Ayatina Laghafiluna
